§72012§r

Comments: \u00a77\u00a7oVersion 2 corrects a mistake in axiom (2.4) noticed by Ignacio Lopez Franco. Only the corrected axiom was used later in the paper so no other consequential change was needed. A few obvious typos have been corrected.
Some material on weighted colimits, composite modules and skew-promonoidal categories has been added. Version 3 adds Example 23 and corrects a few typos./\u00a7r
